member.name: C:nsoftware.InPayPal.Certificate(System.String)
member.summary: Opens CertificateFile and reads out the contents as an X509 public key.

member.name: C:nsoftware.InPayPal.Certificate(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Parses CertificateData as an X509 public key.

member.name: C:nsoftware.InPayPal.Certificate(CertStoreTypes,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: CertStoreType identifies the type of certificate store to use. See StoreType for descriptions of the different certificate stores. Store is a file containing the certificate store. StorePassword is the password used to protect the store. After the store has been successfully opened, the constructor will attempt to find the certificate identified by Subject . This can be either a complete or a substring match of the X509 certificate's subject Distinguished Name (DN).

member.name: C:nsoftware.InPayPal.Certificate(CertStoreTypes,System.String,System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: CertStoreType identifies the type of certificate store to use. See StoreType for descriptions of the different certificate stores. Store is a file containing the certificate store. StorePassword is the password used to protect the store. After the store has been successfully opened, the constructor will load Encoded as an X509 certificate and search the opened store for a corresponding private key.

member.name: C:nsoftware.InPayPal.Certificate(CertStoreTypes,System.Byte[],System.String,System.String)
member.summary: CertStoreType identifies the type of certificate store to use. See StoreType for descriptions of the different certificate stores. Store is a string (binary- or base64-encoded) containing the certificate store. StorePassword is the password used to protect the store. After the store has been successfully opened, the constructor will attempt to find the certificate identified by Subject . This can be either a complete or a substring match of the X509 certificate's subject Distinguished Name (DN).

member.name: C:nsoftware.InPayPal.Certificate(CertStoreTypes,System.Byte[],System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: CertStoreType identifies the type of certificate store to use. See StoreType for descriptions of the different certificate stores. Store is a string (binary- or base64-encoded) containing the certificate store. StorePassword is the password used to protect the store. After the store has been successfully opened, the constructor will load Encoded as an X509 certificate and search the opened store for a corresponding private key.
